author: Oscar Ge

text:
I sent in a picture of my NES, SNES, and N64 collection, where my heart and fondest childhood memories are forever etched in their saved games and beloved cartridges.  Just looking at them again got to me.

Thanks again SupraDarky for reminding us of the mental journey each music track has taken us on at some point in our lives, of the memories they invoke and most importantly, of showing us that such great music comes from all genres past and present , and that there is always room for more.

author: AceAngelPrincess2431

text:
Mr. SupraDarky, I have an important question about this contest because I am not sure if I understand this completely.

I am thinking about taking a picture of something that represents a particular game that I think has great music in it. The question is: Has VGM #1000 already been predetermined, or is it possible that those participating in this contest potentially have a say as to what song is to be the 1000th entry?
